summary: The diff implements a comprehensive multi-page website for City Pharma and Diagnostic Centre. Most requirements are substantially implemented, but several specific acceptance criteria are only partially or not met. Key issues include: use of TanStack Router instead of React Router v6 as specified; Framer Motion is not actually imported or used anywhere in the diff (animations are CSS-based instead); color tokens are namespaced under 'brand' rather than extending the top-level 'orange'/'maroon' keys; and page transition animations via Framer Motion are absent.

missing_requirements.requirement: Set up React Router v6 with routes for '/', '/medicine', '/pathology', '/ultrasound', and '/doctors'
missing_requirements.reason: The diff uses TanStack Router (createRootRoute, createRoute, RouterProvider from '@tanstack/react-router'), not React Router v6 as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Configure Tailwind CSS extending colors with orange shades as 'orange-600' and 'orange-500' and maroon shades as 'maroon-900', 'maroon-800', 'maroon-700' at the top level
missing_requirements.reason: The tailwind.config.js places the brand colors under 'brand.orange' and 'brand.maroon' namespaces rather than extending the standard 'orange' and 'maroon' top-level color keys as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Framer Motion is installed and importable without errors
missing_requirements.reason: No import of 'framer-motion' appears in any of the diff files. All animations are implemented using CSS keyframes and Tailwind classes instead.

missing_requirements.requirement: Animate the floating contact button with a subtle pulse using Framer Motion
missing_requirements.reason: The FloatingContactButton uses CSS 'animate-pulse-ring' class animations, not Framer Motion as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero SVG animations play on mount using Framer Motion including floating pills, stethoscope icon, and heartbeat line animated via SVG stroke-dasharray/stroke-dashoffset
missing_requirements.reason: Home page uses CSS animation classes (animate-float, animate-float-delayed) instead of Framer Motion. No framer-motion import is present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero animations play on page load using Framer Motion; delivery process steps animate sequentially with Framer Motion
missing_requirements.reason: Medicine page uses CSS animation classes instead of Framer Motion. No framer-motion import is present in Medicine.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section with animated lab beaker/flask using Framer Motion
missing_requirements.reason: Pathology page uses CSS animation classes (animate-float, animate-float-delayed, animate-float-slow) instead of Framer Motion.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section with animated ultrasound wave SVG graphics using Framer Motion
missing_requirements.reason: Ultrasound page uses CSS animation classes instead of Framer Motion. No framer-motion import is present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply Framer Motion hover effects (scale + shadow) to each doctor card
missing_requirements.reason: Doctor cards use CSS class 'card-hover group' for hover effects rather than Framer Motion whileHover animations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply Framer Motion page transition animations globally so each route change fades/slides in the new page content
missing_requirements.reason: The App.tsx applies a CSS class 'page-transition' to the main element but no AnimatePresence or motion components from framer-motion are used for route transitions.

hallucinated_features.description: TanStack Router used instead of React Router v6
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly requires React Router v6. TanStack Router is a different library that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: react-icons/si library used for social media icons (SiFacebook, SiInstagram, SiX) in Footer
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies using Lucide React for social media placeholder icons. react-icons is an additional dependency not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the entire App in main.tsx
hallucinated_features.reason: Internet Identity or any authentication is explicitly listed as a non-goal. Wrapping the app in InternetIdentityProvider adds authentication scaffolding not required by this build.
